Note
This resource is a work-in-progress but represents our current understanding for each venue -- if you see anything that's wrong or could be improved, please make a post below and we will incorporate it!

item.title: [GUIDE] How I Do Shows???
item.author: invalid@example.com (TCUP)
item.category: a guide to HOW TO DO A SHOW + booking contacts
item.dc:creator: TCUP
item.content:encoded:
HOW I DO SHOWS???
by TCUP​

Like many industries, the "live music" world can sometimes feel opaque and confusing from the outside (and also...the inside), with lots of knowledge that can be hard to come by if you don't have a ton of experience - inscrutable lingo (What are "deads"? What does "front of house" mean?? What is a "buyout"??!! What does "Spotify demonetized my music" mean???!!!), poor communication, some venue owners doing their best to rip you off...

Read more
